dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 4662 IH: Student Aid Enhancement Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Lawson of Florida introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to exclude the income and assets of dependent students in the calculation of the expected family contribution for such students.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Student Aid Enhancement Act.

section.header: Calculating expected family contribution for dependent students
section.text: Part F of title IV of the Higher Education Act of 1965 (20 U.S.C. 1087kk et seq.) is amended—

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (1)(B), by striking the student and; and
in paragraph (4)(B), by striking and (B) the student and and inserting or (B);

clause.text: by striking the sum of and all that follows through the parents’ contribution and inserting the parents’ contribution;

subparagraph.text: by redesignating subsection (i) as subsection (g); and

paragraph.text: in section 480(b)(1)(F) (20 U.S.C. 1087vv(b)(1)(F)), by striking , except and all that follows through parents.
